short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a timer built to help you focus while doing homework using the Pomodoro study technique.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that allows user to utilize a desired work and break period. Mostly useful for the pomodoro study technique to help guide user through intense study periods followed by break periods
